messages.content: Comfyui_segformer_b2_clothes is a SegFormer model fine-tuned on the ATR dataset for clothes segmentation, but it can also be used for human segmentation.
What are the steps to install Comfyui_segformer_b2_clothes?

The installation steps for Comfyui_segformer_b2_clothes are: 1. Download and put it on custom_nodes. 2. Download models from the specified URLs and place them in the models directory. 3. Install dependencies from requirements.txt.
Which models need to be downloaded for Comfyui_segformer_b2_clothes?

For Comfyui_segformer_b2_clothes, you need to download the segformer_b2_clothes model from https://huggingface.co/mattmdjaga/segformer_b2_clothes and the segformer_b3_fashion model from https://huggingface.co/sayeed99/segformer-b3-fashion.
Where should the downloaded models be placed?
The downloaded models should be placed in the models directory, with segformer_b2_clothes in models/segformer_b2_clothes and segformer_b3_fashion in models/segformer_b3_fashion.
What is the purpose of the requirements.txt file in Comfyui_segformer_b2_clothes installation?
The requirements.txt file contains the dependencies required for Comfyui_segformer_b2_clothes. It needs to be installed as part of the installation process.
What does the segformer_b2_clothes model do?
The segformer_b2_clothes model is used for clothes segmentation, as demonstrated in the provided image.
What does the segformer_b3_fashion model do?
The segformer_b3_fashion model is also used for clothes segmentation, as shown in the second provided image.
